title: Find the bottleneck link for each path
text:
Each end-to-end connection passes through three links:

the server link ($$R_S = 50\ \text{Mbps}$$),

the shared middle link ($$R = 300\ \text{Mbps}$$), and

the client link ($$R_C = 90\ \text{Mbps}$$).

Because the middle link is shared equally among four connections, each pair gets a fair share of
$$ \dfrac{R}{4} = \dfrac{300}{4} = 75\ \text{Mbps} $$.
